mapper.select: -- SELECT CateName from CurriculumCate group by CateName select CateName from CurriculumCate where DelStatus = 0

select.if: select Curriculum_no, CurriName from Curriculum c, CurriculumCate cc where c.CurriculumCate_no=cc.CurriculumCate_no and c.StartDate<=current_date and current_date<=c.EndDate and cc.CateName=#{cateName}
select Curriculum_no, CurriName from Curriculum c, CurriculumCate cc where c.CurriculumCate_no=cc.CurriculumCate_no and cc.CateName=#{cateName}

mapper.select: select CurriName, StartDate, EndDate, GisuName from Curriculum where Curriculum_no=#{curriculum_no};

select c.GisuName, sis.Subject_no from SubInStep sis, StepInPack sip, Package p, Curriculum c where sis.Step_no = sip.Step_no and sip.Package_no = p.Package_no and p.Package_no = c.Package_no and sis.SubInStep_no=#{sisNo}
